UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Oncorhyncin III: a potent antimicrobial peptide derived from the non-histone chromosomal protein H6 of rainbow trout, Oncorhynchus mykiss
Literature.Author: Fernandes JM, Saint N, Kemp GD, Smith VJ

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Aerococcus viridans NCIMB 1120(MIC=0.06-0.12µM),Aeromonas hydrophila NCIMB 1134(MIC=>0.5µM),Aeromonas salmonicida MT004(MIC=>0.5µM),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6051(MIC=0.25-0.5µM),Escherichia coli NCIMB 12210(MIC=0.25-0.5µM),Vibrio anguillarum NCIMB 2129(MIC=0.25-0.5µM),Micrococcus luteus NCIMB 376(MIC=0.12-0.25µM),Planococcus citreus NCIMB 1493(MIC=0.06-0.12µM),Planococcus citreus NCIMB 1493(MIC=0.12-0.24µM),Planococcus citreus NCIMB 1493(MIC=0.48-0.96µM)
